column7: Upon using card, stack 1 for each condition met: 1.Single Target, 2. Skill card. For every !M! layer stacked, a random card's cost -1 for this turn, and gain 3 hsrmod:Boost.
column13: Upon using card, stack 1 for each condition met: 1.Single Target, 2. Skill card, 3. Upgraded card. For every !M! layer stacked, a random card's cost -1 for this turn, and gain 3 hsrmod:Boost.

column7: Use 100 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Gain X layers of hsrmod:Boost , and all upgraded cards in hand cost 1 less this turn, with an additional -1 per upgrade level.
column13: Use 100 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Draw X cards, gain X layers of hsrmod:Boost , and reduce the cost of all upgraded cards in hand this turn by 1, with an additional -1 per upgrade level.

column7: For every !M! times the leftmost card is played, draw 1 card.
column13: For every !M! times the leftmost card is played, draw 1 card. Cards costing more than 0 count as 2 cards.

column7: Use 80 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Discard any number of cards, gain Block multiplied by !M!.
column13: Use 80 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Discard any number of cards, gain Block multiplied by !M! and upgrade discarded cards.

column7: Ethereal. Exhaust. Randomly select 1 card in hand to permanently upgrade.
column13: Ethereal. Exhaust. Choose 1 card in hand to permanently upgrade.

column7: Use 40 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Gain Block equal to the number of cards in hand, and upgrade one of them.
Exhaust all [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Gain 1 Block per 10 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] exhausted.
column13: Exhaust all [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Gain 1 Block per 10 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] exhausted and draw 1 card per 100 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] exhausted.

column7: Retain. Discard 1 card, gain !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . If [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] is not full, return this card to your hand.
column13: Retain. Discard 1 card, gain !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] (or choose not to discard and Exhaust [E] to gain double [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] ). If [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] is not full, return this card to hand.

column7: Use 140 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , Deal !D! quantum damage (!TR!) to all enemies. Lose 1 HP per AoE card in hand and reduce its cost by 1 this turn.
After consuming [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , draw 1 card from the draw pile and gain !M! Block.
Gain 1 layer of hsrmod:Brain-In-A-Vat at the start of each turn. [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] would always be at least !M!.
Recover [E] for every !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] consumed.
column13: Innate. Recover [E] for every !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] consumed.

column7: Exhaust. Use !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Draw 1 card per other Exhaust-cost card in hand, recover [E] and gain 40 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] .
column13: Use !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] . Draw 1 card per other Exhaust-cost card in hand, recover [E] and gain 40 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , and this card’s cost doubles for the rest of the battle.

column7: Gain !M! layers of hsrmod:Brain-In-A-Vat .
column13: Innate. Gain !M! layers of hsrmod:Brain-In-A-Vat .

column7: Exhaust. Set [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] to max.
column13: Set [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] to max.

column7: When playing an AoE attack card, if there are only 1/2/3 enemies, damage +6/4/2.
column13: When playing an AoE attack card, if there are only 1/2/3 enemies, damage +9/6/3.

column7: Use 100 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , Deal !D! quantum damage (!TR!) to all enemies. If there’s another Exhaust-cost card in hand, deal 1 more hit.
column13: Use 100 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , Deal !D! quantum damage (!TR!) to all enemies. If there’s another Exhaust-cost card, deal 1 more hit; if there’s another AoE card, deal 1 more hit.

column7: Exhaust. Retain. Consume !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] to gain 1 layer of Intangible.
column13: Retain. Consume !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] to gain 1 layer of Intangible, and this card’s cost doubles for the rest of the battle.
